document_data.name: Ansel Burwyth
document_data.deathnotes: Slain by magical traps in Liongirt Tower.
document_data.mainbody: '''Ansel Burwyth''', also called the '''Master of Gems''', was a skilled [[wizard]] who lived during the 4{{th}} century [[DR]] in [[Mulhorand]] or one of the nearby regions.
document_data.History: Ansel was hired in [[326 DR]], along with many other mages, by the ruling bodies of [[Tashalar]] to rid them of [[Magister]] [[Onsilur Maerdrathom]] who had become quite a nuisance to their way of life. Ansel succeeded where others who came before him failed. He was able to trap the soul of Onsilur within a ''[[tel'kiira]]''. Lured by the riches left for the taking in Onsilur's [[Liongirt Tower|tower]], Ansel hid the ''kiira'' and entered the tower, only to be killed by the wide array of magical traps Onsilur had in place.
